title: Neuer Fun Mode für Lol Testversion

embed.description: Hier kannst du einfach und schnell deine Bilder & Fotos hochladen. Nach nur wenigen Sekunden ist der Bild Upload erfolgt und du kannst die Bilder sofort deinen Freunden zeigen und in Foren oder Blogs einbinden. Die Nutzung ist kostenlos und ohne Anmeldung möglich.

body:
LoL Fun Mode:

Inspired by: 	Find the teemo
		Quidditch






Map Preparation:

First of all you will, need 4 Zz`Rot- Portals one each side, lined up just like the Green wards (Picture above). Secondly you need 5 Pink wards on each side placed like i did.
Thats all for now.

Line up:

You will need a minimum of 8 players 4 on each side or a maximum of 10.
(Each of these sides has to have one Teemo!!)

There are 3 Main roles.
1: The Spy (1 player only): Passive:(He is the only one who is allowed to use the Oracle alteration or the red trinket) The Spys main task is to search and find Teemo. 
!If he finds teemo and executes him on his own he will get 4 points instead of 2!
(If the Spy gets killed 3.times by the enemy Gang the enemy team will lose 1 point.
This stacks so if you kill him 6 times total you lose 2 and if you kill him 9 times 4 it doubles everytime!)

2: The Gang(2-3players): Passive: (The Gang is the only Groupin this game who is allowed to attack and kill anyone they meet at any time)
The Gangs Main tasks are:
to help teemo to survive
killing 10 enemy champs to reciev 1 point 
or to find teemo and kill him for 2 Points


3: Teemo one of the most hated char in League of Legends but this time he is a real game changer
	-Teemo has to hide in his own half till the Spys starts to search for them.
	-While the Spys are searching teemo can just hide or he is allowed as only champ in this
game to destroy the enemys zz portals (if he destroy all 4 protals the team wins automatically).                                                                                                          
-Teemo has 3 lives if he dies everyone has to back up and let the teemos hide again 
Temo only is allowed to spend a max of 1400 gold for his equip


Win Conditions:
You win
1. if you killed teemo 3 times
2.if teemo destroy every zz`rot portal
3.if one team hits 20 Points total thats tricky cause if you reach 21 or more points you autmatically       lose 10 points

Thats it for now its just a test mode i made this game in 1 hour and if you support me im going to introduce more roles and so on so just tell me your thoughts and i will think about it in this beta game!

Rules:
No champs with abilites which only cast if the teemo is near like morg and so on.
Only bot or top jungle are useable if a champ runs on lanes after the game started the team loses 1 point

Produced by Justhookedsenna

Ps. Sorry for my English My Mothertongue is German
